name: Ghost and Hostage
description:
This game is a soundless prototype created in 3 hours to experiment with the idea of a shooter where the player can turn invisible.

GOAL:

Get to the hostage, and lead the hostage to the Evac Point without getting shot.

Tip:

Watch out for the blue lines emitted by the enemies when they see you.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Space activates or deactivates cloak.

Point mouse to aim.

Left mouse button to shoot.

Known issues:

Aside from the huge lack of any kind of polish, there seems to be a graphical glitch of a kind I've never seen before. Basically, when you're moving around, a series of lines outlining the tiles I used for the floor may appear.  Additionally, you may be initially unable to move until you shoot your gun. Be prepared to turn invisible immediately!

Feedback is welcome.
